languages.text: "Я все еще чувствую его когти в своей груди. Мороз терзает мясо... Раны, оставленные духами, опасны. Они создают духовную связь между твоим телом и его зловредным разумом. Лишь из крови, пролитой их бесплотными телами, можно сварить зелье, врачующее такие увечья".

"I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."
languages.original_text: "Я все еще чувствую его когти в своей груди. Мороз терзает мясо... Раны, оставленные духами, опасны. Они создают духовную связь между твоим телом и его зловредным разумом. Лишь из крови, пролитой их бесплотными телами, можно сварить зелье, врачующее такие увечья".

traits.locale_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: “我依然能感觉到它的利爪嵌在我的胸口里，冰霜在撕扯着我的血肉……恶灵留下的伤口非常危险。它会将它邪恶的思想植入你的肉体，建立精神联系。若想治好这样的伤口，唯一的办法就是杀了它们，用它们虚幻的躯体中流出来的鲜血调配药水。”
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: “我依然能感觉到它的利爪嵌在我的胸口里，冰霜在撕扯着我的血肉……恶灵留下的伤口非常危险。它会将它邪恶的思想植入你的肉体，建立精神联系。若想治好这样的伤口，唯一的办法就是杀了它们，用它们虚幻的躯体中流出来的鲜血调配药水。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「その爪がまだ胸に残ってる気がするよ。凍りつき、切り刻まれる肉…精神に刻まれる傷は危険だ。肉体と邪悪な心とが霊的に結びついてしまう。こういう切り傷を癒やせるのは、霊体からしたたる血を煎じた薬だけだ」
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「その爪がまだ胸に残ってる気がするよ。凍りつき、切り刻まれる肉…精神に刻まれる傷は危険だ。肉体と邪悪な心とが霊的に結びついてしまう。こういう切り傷を癒やせるのは、霊体からしたたる血を煎じた薬だけだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Aún siento sus garras en mi pecho. La escarcha desgarrando mi carne... Las heridas que infligen los espíritus son muy peligrosas. Crean un vínculo espiritual entre tu cuerpo y su espantosa mente. La única forma de curar semejante mutilación es con una poción hecha a partir de la sangre derramada de sus cuerpos incorpóreos».
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Aún siento sus garras en mi pecho. La escarcha desgarrando mi carne... Las heridas que infligen los espíritus son muy peligrosas. Crean un vínculo espiritual entre tu cuerpo y su espantosa mente. La única forma de curar semejante mutilación es con una poción hecha a partir de la sangre derramada de sus cuerpos incorpóreos».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Je sens encore ses griffes plantées dans ma poitrine et le givre lacérant mes chairs... Les blessures infligées par un esprit sont dangereuses, car elles créent un lien entre votre corps et son esprit pernicieux. La seule façon de soigner de telles mutilations est de préparer une potion à partir du sang versé par son corps intangible. »
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Je sens encore ses griffes plantées dans ma poitrine et le givre lacérant mes chairs... Les blessures infligées par un esprit sont dangereuses, car elles créent un lien entre votre corps et son esprit pernicieux. La seule façon de soigner de telles mutilations est de préparer une potion à partir du sang versé par son corps intangible. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ich spüre die Klauen noch immer in meiner Brust. Frost, der Fleisch zerkleinert ... Wunden durch Geister sind gefährlich. Sie erzeugen eine spirituelle Verbindung zwischen Eurem Körper und dem böswilligen Geist. Heilbar sind solche Verstümmelungen nur durch einen Trank aus dem Blut seines körperlosen Körpers."
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich spüre die Klauen noch immer in meiner Brust. Frost, der Fleisch zerkleinert ... Wunden durch Geister sind gefährlich. Sie erzeugen eine spirituelle Verbindung zwischen Eurem Körper und dem böswilligen Geist. Heilbar sind solche Verstümmelungen nur durch einen Trank aus dem Blut seines körperlosen Körpers."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Pençelerini hâlâ göğsümde hissedebiliyorum. Soğuk derimi parçaladı. Ruhların bıraktığı yaralar tehlikelidir. Bedeninle saldırganın kötücül zihni arasında ruhani bir bağ oluştururlar. Bu yarayı iyileştirmenin tek yolu, ruhun manevi bedeninin döktüğü kanla iksir hazırlamaktır."
languages.original_text: "I can still feel its claws in my chest. Frost shredding flesh... Wounds left by spirits are dangerous. They create a spiritual link between your body and its pernicious mind. The only way to heal such mutilations is to brew a potion from the blood spilt by their incorporeal bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Pençelerini hâlâ göğsümde hissedebiliyorum. Soğuk derimi parçaladı. Ruhların bıraktığı yaralar tehlikelidir. Bedeninle saldırganın kötücül zihni arasında ruhani bir bağ oluştururlar. Bu yaraları iyileştirmenin tek yolu, manevi bedenin döktüğü kanla bir iksir hazırlamaktır."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
